https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bdoiGW2CpsBZmtBJWeDYbaHQyBN.jpg Best friends for life, Jonny and Joe are two young shadows who have detached themselves from their bodies in a bid for fun and adventure. But whilst Jonny embraces his newfound freedom, Joe becomes daunted by the aimlessness of this new life. A Trick of the Light
